extendedInfo.description: Looking for a hotel, a B&B or a lodging in Bangkok? Search no more! This application has all the information you need: * You can use it if you are in a car, on a bicycle or walking * You can view all objectives on the map * You can search objectives * You can view objectives near you * You can view directions (visual route, distance and duration) * You can use it with Street View * You can use it with NavigationObjectives: * Hotels * Bed & Breakfast * Lodging * and more!Keywords: Bangkok, Thailand, tourist, hotel, bed & breakfast, lodging, accommodation, sleep, night, street view, navigation

reviews.title: Incomplete
reviews.comment: Samsung tablet Good maps but there are so many major hotels not listed.
reviews.author: Phil Bliss
